short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect web page resources based on user-defined rules, useful for frontend development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is designed to help users manage and organize their web page resource redirect rules more efficiently. 

Users can easily add, edit, and delete rule groups to better control and utilize these rules. 

With an intuitive interface, users can quickly access their rules and make necessary adjustments. 

Additionally, the extension supports importing and exporting rules, allowing users to sync and share rules across different devices. 

Installing this extension can significantly enhance user productivity, helping them manage complex rule sets more effectively.

- Replace JavaScript and CSS resources with custom URLs
- Group rules for better organization
- Enable/disable individual rules or entire rule groups
- Import / Export rules
- Modern UI built with Ant Design
- Auto switch light / dark mode
